channel.title: Using a no-IP to host a server
channel.description: I have everything set up on my server but i can't get it to use my no-ip. I looked through client.java and couldn't find where the IP was. Any ideas of where it might be?

item.title: Using a no-IP to host a server
item.dc:creator: @Pyromaniac4food Pyromaniac4food
item.description:
@Pyromaniac4food wrote:

Ok, I thought I had fixed my port forward. So How do I set that to host my IP? If you have msn add mine Pyro-fire@hotmail.com

Read full topic
